home.heroDescription: A place where ideas are born. Share your thoughts, write articles, find like-minded people, and build your community.
home.featuresTitle: Everything you need in one place
home.featuresSubtitle: BlogSpace combines the best features of social networks and blogging platforms
home.featurePostsDesc: Share thoughts, ideas, and news with friends and followers
home.featureArticlesDesc: Create long-form content with formatting and images
home.featureChatDesc: Exchange messages in real time with other users
home.featureFriendsDesc: Follow interesting people and find like-minded individuals
home.featureTrendsDesc: Discover popular topics through hashtags and recommendations
home.featurePrivacyDesc: Control who sees your profile and can message you
home.ctaSubtitle: Create a free account and start sharing your ideas today

about.heroDescription: BlogSpace is more than just a social network. It's a place where ideas are born, communities are formed, and every voice matters.
about.missionText1: We strive to create a platform where everyone can freely express their thoughts, find like-minded people, and build meaningful connections.
about.missionText2: BlogSpace combines the best of social networks and blogging platforms, providing tools for both short posts and in-depth articles.
about.valuesSubtitle: Principles that guide us every day
about.valueCommunityDesc: We believe in the power of bringing people together with shared interests and goals
about.valueSecurityDesc: User data protection and privacy is our top priority
about.valueInnovationDesc: We constantly evolve and implement new technologies for a better experience
about.valueOpennessDesc: Transparency in work and honesty with our users
about.historySubtitle: The journey from idea to a platform with thousands of users
about.timeline23Desc: The idea was born to create a platform where everyone can share their thoughts
about.timeline24Desc: Official launch of BlogSpace with basic posts and profiles functionality
about.timeline25Desc: Added chats, articles, hashtags and reached 10,000 users milestone
about.teamSubtitle: People who make BlogSpace better every day
about.ctaSubtitle: We're always happy to help and answer any questions about BlogSpace

contact.heroDescription: Have questions or suggestions? We're always happy to help! Choose a convenient way to contact us or fill out the form below.
contact.messageSent: Message sent! We'll reply to you shortly.
contact.fastResponseText: Average response time is 2 hours during business hours. For urgent questions, use Telegram.
contact.faqSubtitle: Answers to popular questions from our users
contact.faq1Question: How do I create an account?
contact.faq1Answer: Click the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner, fill out the form with your details, and confirm your email. After that, you can start using all BlogSpace features.
contact.faq2Question: How do I reset my password?
contact.faq2Answer: On the login page, click "Forgot password?", enter your email, and follow the instructions in the email. The password reset link is valid for 24 hours.
contact.faq3Question: How do I delete my account?
contact.faq3Answer: Go to Settings → Account → Delete Account. Please note that this action is irreversible and all your data will be deleted.
contact.faq4Answer: Click the three dots next to the post and select "Report". Choose the reason for the report, and our moderation team will review it within 24 hours.
contact.faq5Answer: You can write to us through the form on this page, send an email to support@blogspace.com, or contact us on social media.

errorBoundary.title: An error occurred
errorBoundary.label: Something went wrong. Try reloading the page or come back later.
